Class EngineImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • receiver.EngineImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditorEngine

    public class EngineImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EditorEngine
    EngineImpl Execute commands on buffer, clipboard and selection
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yann Jegu & Quentin Guillou
